item.title: Building Agent Supervisors to Generate Insights
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction In the rapidly evolving field of artificial intelligence, the concept of agent supervisors has emerged as a powerful approach to orchestrating multiple AI agents for complex tasks.
